Room.Name: Lelion Beach Stairs
Room.ShortDescription: You are on stairs which connect Lelion Way to the beach area below it.
Room.LongDescription: These are wide stone stairs, leading from Lelion Way above, to the Lelion Beach and Park below. You are half down or up, depending on which way you are going, and the stairs form a landing here, and an observation deck. Looking north you see the Lithium Inlet, and across it you see the northwest section of the city. Going down will take you to the path which leads west towards the Nylandian Bay.
